alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:05AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calumet and central Winnebago Counties through 445 AM CDT... At 404 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rush Lake, or 7 miles east of Berlin, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oshkosh around 425 AM CDT. Menasha and Northern Lake Winnebago around 440 AM CDT. Appleton around 445 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Butte Des Morts, Highland Shore, Larsen, Lake Butte Des Morts, Uw Fox Valley, Winnebago, Rivermoor, Winneconne, Harrison and Harbor Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
